General.Name: AztechWB Co. Ltd
General.Description: AztechWB Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells textiles in South Korea. The company is involved in dyeing, spinning, weaving, and finishing wool and wool blended fabrics. It offers products under the Rossum brand name through its online shop. AztechWB Co., Ltd. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
